ERC20Burnable","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"UniMate Team","custom:security-contact":"security@unimate.com","details":"Upgraded to AccessControl for role-based permissions (Biconomy + Defender Relayer integration)","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"ECDSAInvalidSignature()":[{"details":"The signature derives the `address(0)`."}],"ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256)":[{"details":"The signature has an invalid length."}],"ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32)":[{"details":"The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"events":{"EIP712DomainChanged()":{"details":"MAY be emitted to signal that the domain could have changed."},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"batchReconcile(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"Called by Defender Relayer for nightly reconciliation","params":{"points":"Array of points to convert (must match users length)","users":"Array of user addresses"}},"canUserRedeem(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Amount to check","user":"Address to check"},"returns":{"canRedeem":"Whether the user can redeem this amount"}},"eip712Domain()":{"details":"returns the fields and values that describe the domain separator used by this contract for EIP-712 signature."},"getRate()":{"returns":{"_0":"Current rate per voucher"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"isNonceUsed(uint256)":{"params":{"nonce":"The nonce to check"},"returns":{"used":"Whether the nonce has been used"}},"pointsToWell(uint256)":{"params":{"points":"Amount of challenge points"},"returns":{"wellAmount":"Equivalent WELL amount"}},"redeem(string,uint256)":{"params":{"rewardId":"String identifier for the reward being redeemed","wellAmount":"Amount of WELL tokens to burn for this redemption"}},"redeemWithPoints(address,uint256,string,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"deadline":"Expiration timestamp for the signature","nonce":"Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks","points":"Amount of challenge points to redeem","rewardId":"String identifier for the reward being redeemed","signature":"EIP-712 signature from backend","user":"The user address"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"setBackendSigner(address)":{"params":{"newSigner":"New backend signer address"}},"setPointsToWellRate(uint256)":{"params":{"newRate":"New rate (e.g., 100 means 100 points = 1e18 WELL)"}},"setRate(uint256)":{"params":{"newRate":"New rate in WELL tokens per voucher"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas."}},"title":"Enhanced redemption system: supports both allowance-based and challenge point redemption","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"batchReconcile(address[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Batch reconcile points to WELL tokens (Backend operation via Defender Relayer)"},"canUserRedeem(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Check if user has sufficient balance and allowance to redeem"},"getRate()":{"notice":"Get current rate for informational purposes"},"isNonceUsed(uint256)":{"notice":"Check if a nonce has been used"},"pointsToWell(uint256)":{"notice":"Convert points to WELL amount for preview"},"redeem(string,uint256)":{"notice":"Burn `wellAmount` from msg.sender. Requires ERC20 allowance to be set to this contract."},"redeemWithPoints(address,uint256,string,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Redeem challenge points for rewards using EIP-712 signature"},"setBackendSigner(address)":{"notice":"Set the backend signer address for challenge point redemption"},"setPointsToWellRate(uint256)":{"notice":"Set the points to WELL conversion rate"},"setRate(uint256)":{"notice":"Set the rate per voucher for informational purposes"}},"notice":"Allows users to burn WELL tokens to redeem various rewards via two methods:         1. Traditional: Direct WELL token burning via allowance         2. Challenge Points: EIP-712 signed redemption with mint-and-burn         3. Backend Batch Reconciliation: For Defender Relayer batchReconcile(address[],uint256[]).details: Called by Defender Relayer for nightly reconciliation

params.points: Array of points to convert (must match users length)

returns.canRedeem: Whether the user can redeem this amount

eip712Domain().details: returns the fields and values that describe the domain separator used by this contract for EIP-712 signature.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

returns.used: Whether the nonce has been used

params.rewardId: String identifier for the reward being redeemed
params.wellAmount: Amount of WELL tokens to burn for this redemption

params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.points: Amount of challenge points to redeem
params.rewardId: String identifier for the reward being redeemed

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.newRate: New rate in WELL tokens per voucher

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

batchReconcile(address[],uint256[]).notice: Batch reconcile points to WELL tokens (Backend operation via Defender Relayer)

canUserRedeem(address,uint256).notice: Check if user has sufficient balance and allowance to redeem

getRate().notice: Get current rate for informational purposes

isNonceUsed(uint256).notice: Check if a nonce has been used

pointsToWell(uint256).notice: Convert points to WELL amount for preview

redeem(string,uint256).notice: Burn `wellAmount` from msg.sender. Requires ERC20 allowance to be set to this contract.

redeemWithPoints(address,uint256,string,.notice: Redeem challenge points for rewards using EIP-712 signature

setBackendSigner(address).notice: Set the backend signer address for challenge point redemption

setPointsToWellRate(uint256).notice: Set the points to WELL conversion rate

setRate(uint256).notice: Set the rate per voucher for informational purposes
